title: IT Outlook 2026: Brokerages Warn Of Slow Recovery And Selective Opportunities
description: India’s IT services sector enters 2026 with cautious optimism as global brokerages paint a picture of gradual improvement rather than a sharp revival. Despite the noise around artificial intelligence, the sector’s fortunes remain firmly tied to macroeconomic conditions, with growth expected to recover only modestly.

title: Delhi High Court backs Ajay Devgn's personality rights, orders deepfake takedown
description: The Delhi High Court has granted interim relief to actor Ajay Devgn, restraining unauthorized use of his personality traits and ordering removal of obscene content, following allegations of misuse through commercial merchandise and artificial intelligence.
content: The Delhi High Court has issued an interim order in favour of actor Ajay Devgn, providing protection for his personality rights. The court has restrained several defendants from using Devgn's images and personal characteristics without his consent. T... [1824 chars]

title: What is agentic AI, and would you trust it to book a flight?
description: Companies are racing to develop artificial intelligence tools that can make reservations for flights, hotels and more on your behalf. Here's what to know.
content:
A bot may soon be booking your vacation.

title: More than 20 representatives of Chinese enterprises visit Saudi Arabia to explore new opportunities in the international market
description: RIYADH, Saudi Arabia, Nov. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Recently, a delegation of Chinese private enterprises, organized by the Chinese enterprise service platform TOJOY Enterprise Service, held business talks with the Ministry of Investment of Saudi Arabia in Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. Mr. Ge Jun, Chairman and CEO of TOJOY Enterprise Service, joined more than 20 representatives from companies including Zhejiang Great Wall Mixing Equipment Co., Ltd. and Longqing Southeast (Hainan) Green Building Co., Ltd. The discussions covered investment, infrastructure, healthcare, artificial intelligence and other sectors. Assistant Deputy Minister Fahd Mansour Alhashem and other officials attended the meeting. The two sides held pragmatic discussions on the Saudi investment environment, industrial policies, and cooperation opportunities between Chinese and Saudi enterprises.
